title: Learning Style Analysis and Application Strategies Based on Social Networking Services (SNS)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of learning theories and basic digital platform utilization skills
context.additional_context: Conducts language learning simulations using a Facebook-like platform in real work environments.

learning_goals: Learning style diagnostics can quantitatively analyze individuals' information processing preferences.
The correlation between social media usage patterns and learning styles can be explained based on real-world cases.
Customized content production strategies for different learning styles can be designed in a VR environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
